attributes.action: Make a ruling that Peerages should  not be given to MPs who have been in a failed goverment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My reasons for this is that when i watch a debate in the house of Lords i see past MPs like the ones who were in the labour goverment of 1979. And this goverment brought the country to its knees and was also voted down in a vote of no confidence. Rewards for failure once again.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
